newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistan money rates fluctuates to end steady.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan money rates fluctuates to end steady.

text.p: Pakistan's money rates fluctuated widely on Tuesday before ending steady as banks were unsure of liquidity status, dealer said.
Ovenight trades started at the level of 19.50 percent but slipped to 16 percent as lenders flooded the market, a dealer at KASB & Co said.
The rates strated climbing at midday and major deals were struck between 16 and 19 percent, he said. Closing deals were seen at 18 and 19.50 percent.
